ccdhmodel

CRDC-H model in LinkML, developed by the Center for Cancer Data Harmonization (CCDH)

  • View On GitHub

This project is maintained by cancerDHC

Class: Patient

URI: ccdh:Patient

Parents

  • is_a: Entity - Any resource that has its own identifier

Referenced by class

  • None ➞associated_patient OPT Patient
  • None ➞derived_from_subject OPT Patient

Attributes

Own

  • Patient➞id REQ
    • Description: The ‘logical’ identifier of the entity in the system of record, e.g. a UUID. This ‘id’ is unique within a given system. The identified entity may have a different ‘id’ in a different system.
    • range: String
  • ➞identifier 0..*
    • Description: A ‘business’ identifier for the entity, typically as provided by an external system or authority, that persists across implementing systems.
    • range: Identifier
  • ➞taxon OPT
    • Description: The taxonomic group (e.g. species) of the patient.
    • range: CodeableConcept
